title: In a Reversal, Biden Opens Door to Super PAC
text:
WASHINGTON—Joe Biden’s campaign cracked open the door Thursday to the possible formation of an independent fundraising group in support of his presidential bid, reversing its stance as Republicans spend millions of dollars against his campaign.

Mr. Biden has disavowed any pro-Biden super PAC and advocated for a constitutional amendment to overturn the 2010 Citizens United Supreme Court decision that helped pave the way for unlimited political expenditures. But his campaign signaled in a statement that it would no longer consider...
description: Joe Biden’s campaign cracked open the door to the possible formation of an independent fundraising group in support of his presidential bid, reversing its stance.
